map.Model
Class Map

java.lang.Object
  map.Model.Map
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Responsible for class Map. Represent class Map as Graph data structure, and the representation is an adjacency list.

Version:
1.0

Yan Wang
